bilingual.source: Day after day, Han Gan painted the horses, his brush presenting every detail that he saw with his own eyes.
bilingual.target: 日复一日，韩干画着马，他的画笔呈现出他亲眼所见的每一个细节。
我们应该审验每一个细节。
她认真对待每一个细节。
她对每个细节都很周密。
他忽略了这个重要的细节。
她仔细检查了每一个细节。
你漏掉了一个重要的细节。
他谨慎地检查了每一个细节。

list.abstract: detail，英语词语，可作动词、名词，翻译为详述、选派、画详图、细节、琐事、具体信息、次要部分等等。

yingyinNormal.en: Unbelievable detail. Ticket. May I see your ticket？
yingyinNormal.zh: 这细节刻画地真赞。您的车票，请出示您的车票。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't have to read it. I know every painful detail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不用读，我了解所有痛苦的细节。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course he would remember every detail. His wife was murdered.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他当然会记得所有的细节，他妻子被谋杀了。

yingyinNormal.en: But in here, every detail adds up to something. Even you, Lawrence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但在这里，每个细节都有所意义，即便是你也一样，劳伦斯。

yingyinNormal.en: They all think it's about more detail. But that's not how memory works.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们都觉得真实的记忆就该细节丰富。但其实并非如此。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. I think people underestimate the importance of detail to the overall impact. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊。我觉得人们会低估注重细节对整体感觉的影响。是啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, one small detail, this is an all-gay bowling league, so I told everyone you're all gay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个小细节，这是基佬保龄球联赛，所以我跟大家说你是基佬。

yingyinNormal.en: And so, I set myself the task of finding it. I created what I imagined biological life to be like down to the most minute detail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 于是，我以找到那生命为己任生命形态创造刻画每一寸细节。

yingyinNormal.en: The attention to detail is... It's just… It is, yes. I've got, I mean, I'm sorry, I'm a little overwhelmed by the moment. It's just…
yingyinNormal.zh: 你对细节的注重简直是...没错。我有...我...抱歉， 我现在有点不知所措。就是…

yingyinNormal.en: It's a melting pot, and it's a mosaic that even if we look up close we'll still see the colors and the flavors of each culture in detail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一个大熔炉，是一个马赛克，如果你凑近看，还能看从细节上看到每一种文化的颜色与风味。

yingyinNormal.en: The very spot where he died? The fact that his skull had been crushed with a rock? That they buried him in an unmarked grave? I mean the detail of all that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 知道他牺牲的确切地点，知道他的脑袋被石头砸扁了？知道他们把他葬在无名冢里，这么多细节。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, but before you go, just take a look around this room. Study every detail, every aspect. Because this is the last time you will ever step foot in here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，但你走之前，好好看看这间屋子。仔细看每处细节，每个方面。因为这是你最后一次踏进这里了

yingyinNormal.en: I just told every detail I know to whoever I got off the phone with an hour ago. I don't know what you guys are doing. I promise you, Mr. Kim, we are taking this very seriously. And as a parent myself, I can only imagine what you must be feeling. But for me to help you, I do need to know how everything unfolded from your eyes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一个小时前刚刚给电话里的人讲了我知道的每一个细节。真不知道你们这些人在干什么。我向你保证，金先生，我们非常重视这件事。我也是一个母亲，我完全理解你的感受。但是站在帮助你的立场上，我必须知道所有的事情从你的视角是怎样的。

yingyinNormal.en: You know those girls text me every detail of their lives as it happens.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要知道她们都会把生活中的每件事都发短信告诉我。

yingyinNormal.en: How could I ever acquire enough detail to make them think that it's reality?
yingyinNormal.zh: 梦境如何设计才令他们相信置身现实。

yingyinNormal.en: Then get her detail on the phone. I did. They can't force her to talk to you, sir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那就打给她的保安。我打了，他们不能逼她跟您说话，先生。

yingyinNormal.en: You were the conduit for AGRA. Every assignment, every detail they got from you. It was my job.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是阿格拉的联络人。每次任务，所有讯息都是从你这儿来的。这是我的职责。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, we have a lot to do and not much time to do it. Bernadette, you're on corn, gravy and yam detail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，我们时间不多，但有很多事要做，Bernadette，你处理玉米，肉汁和山药。

yingyinNormal.en: I am the head of your detail here in Dallas, ma'am, and I've been ordered to keep you securely in this house.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是您在达拉斯的保安主管，夫人。我得到命令要保护您安全留在屋内。

yingyinNormal.en: I do run the place! Or, at least, I know every detail of how it's run. And I ought to be told about any proposed changes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 本来就是我在经营！至少我非常了解医院的方方面面，我理应知道任何改动建议。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: describe item by item; give the full particulars of

examination_example.sentence: When given the option to offer up <highlight>details</highlight> about yourself or studiously stash them away, you should just be honest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你可以选择提供关于自己的细节或刻意隐藏它们时，你就应该诚实。

examination_example.sentence: California is leading the way, as it does on so many climate efforts, in figuring out the <highlight>details</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加州在解决细节问题上处于领先地位，正如它在很多气候问题上所做的努力那样。

examination_example.sentence: Almost all of the interior <highlight>detail</highlight> is of cast iron or plaster; the use of wood was minimized to insure fire safety.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几乎所有的内部细节都是铸铁或石膏；为了确保消防安全，尽量减少了木材的使用。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 详述; 细节; 详情

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: describe item by item; give the full particulars of
sense_info_list.zh: 详述; 细节; 详情

examination_example.sentence: He borrowed technical <highlight>details</highlight> from many sources.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他从许多地方借鉴了技术细节。

examination_example.sentence: If they're alive today, you can put them in scanning rigs, you can get every <highlight>detail</highlight> of their body analysed very carefully.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果他们今天还活着，你可以把他们放在扫描设备里，你可以非常仔细地分析他们身体的每一个细节。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>details</highlight> (of the Paris agreement) on addressing "climate justice" can be best described as sketchy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《巴黎协定》在解决“气候公平性”问题上的细节可以说是粗略无比。

examination_example.sentence: There is also very little <highlight>detail</highlight> on who will provide the funds or, importantly, who is responsible for their provision.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于谁将提供资金，或者是更重要的，谁负责提供资金的细节也很少。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: describe item by item; give the full particulars of
sense_info_list.zh: 详述; 细节; 详情

examination_example.sentence: Coca-Cola also released data <highlight>detailing</highlight> its funding of several medical institutions and associations between 2010 and 2015.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可口可乐还公布了2010年至2015年间对多家医疗机构和协会的详细资助数据。

examination_example.sentence: Residents' hearts and lungs are affected as a consequence All of which, combined with California's reputation as the home of technological innovation, makes the place ideal for developing and testing systems designed to monitor pollution in <highlight>detail</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 居民的心肺都会因此受到影响，再加上加州素有科技创新之乡的美誉，这使得该地成为开发和测试旨在详细监测污染系统的理想场所。

examination_example.sentence: The tests involve solving puzzles, recalling words and <highlight>details</highlight> from stories, and identifying patterns in collections of letters and symbols.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 测试包括解谜、从故事中回忆单词和细节，以及识别字母和符号的组合模式。

examination_example.sentence: The following are some of the <highlight>details</highlight>.
Update her bank card <highlight>details</highlight> on the company's website.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在公司网站上更新她的银行卡信息。

examination_example.sentence: Well, you'll need to update your card <highlight>details</highlight> directly on our website.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你需要直接在我们的网站上更新你的银行卡卡信息。

assign someone to undertake a particular task

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Then, an OIC representative gave us some <highlight>details</highlight>, which somewhat interested me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，一位牛津大学的代表给了我们一些细节，这让我有些感兴趣。

examination_example.sentence: For more <highlight>details</highlight>, visit us at Unit 3 Park View Lane.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 若了解更多详情，请访问我们，地址是ParkViewLane3单元。

examination_example.sentence: You don't have to write these things in <highlight>detail</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你不必把这些东西写得很详细。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Detail</highlight> (细节) is the key to success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 细节(细节)是成功的关键。

examination_example.sentence: C. must know about all the important <highlight>details</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: C.必须知道所有的重要细节

examination_example.sentence: C. It allowed him to see and study the environment in <highlight>detail</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: C.它允许他看到和研究环境的细节。
